original_title: Celebrity chef Gary Mehigan in Sri Lanka
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Renowned British-Australian Michelin Star celebrity chef Gary Mehigan arrived in Sri Lanka late on Monday (27) night.
He reached Colombo from Bangalore, India, aboard a SriLankan Airlines flight.
Chef Gary Mehigan will be engaged in a series of events, from high tea and book signings to showcasing his talent in the culinary arts.
Mehigan is one of the judges of TV Show MasterChef Australia.
Face to Face | Chathuranga Abeysinghe | The NPP Narrative | 28th November 2023
